name: Road To Mexico
description:
You get speed when you are not turning.

Thug's van :

  • Try to escape the police car
  • Launch box to slow the police car

Police car :

  • Hit the  thug's van with the car stopper

Controls 

Xbox Controller :

  • Left stick => move
  • A => launch object

Keyboard player 1 : 

  • w/q/s/d => move
  • space => launch object

Keyboard player 2 : 

  • i/j/k/l => move
  • enter => launch object
